caption: The video starts with two men talking in prison. The man who came to visit the prison was troubled and hesitant by the words of the man who was a prisoner. The next part of the video shows the two women driving to a cabin in the woods. The next scene is an elderly white man wearing a cap. Being interrogated by a black cop.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?
Are there more than six different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than ten different characters appear?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

what's the pattern on the man's hat?
